title: Genre-Based Instructional Approach: Developing TPACK Awareness Among Prospective Indonesian Language Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language teaching methodologies and experience with ICT (Information and Communication Technology) integration
context.additional_context: Learners are pre-service teachers in an Indonesian language teacher training program, aiming to apply genre-based pedagogy and strengthen TPACK competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to apply the seven TPACK dimensions (technology knowledge, content knowledge, pedagogical knowledge, etc.) to genre-based instructional methods.
Learners can design and evaluate Indonesian genre-specific writing instruction strategies using digital tools.
Learners can present case-based analyses of TPACK implementation plans according to learner characteristics (gender, academic achievement, home environment).

resources: LMS platform (video lectures, discussion board, assignment submission system)
Digital Content Creation Tools (e.g., Canva, Padlet)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
